result.name: homelessness-in-england1
result.notes:
Statistics about homelessness for every local authority in England.

This includes annual data covering 2009-10 to 2017-18 based on CLG live table 784, known as the P1E returns.

There are also quarterly returns (live table 784a) which cover April to June; July to September, September to December and January to March, since April 2013 available on the CLG webpage (see links)

Both are provided in excel and csv format.

These data help us compare trends across the country for the decisions local authorities make when people apply to them as homeless and each district's use of temporary accommodation.

organization.name: cambridgeshire-insight
organization.title: Cambridgeshire Insight
organization.description: The Cambridgeshire Insight Partnership is made up of public, health and community bodies to provide a shared research knowledge base for the Cambridgeshire area. It allows users an easy way to access and share data, information and research for deeper insights about their local area. See more at https://cambridgeshireinsight.org.uk

result.title: Homelessness in England

resources.description:
A comma separated (CSV) file providing data on homelessness across England, listed by district, from 2009-10 to 2017-18.
Data is provided by local housing authorities and is published on the goverment's web page at MHCLG.
This version updates previous releases of "Homelessness in England", adding two further year's data and adding region names to assist with analysis of the national picture.
resources.name: Homelessness in England 2009-10 to 2017-8 (csv)

resources.description:
An excel file providing data on homelessness across England, listed by district, from 2009-10 to 2017-18.
Data is provided by local housing authorities and is published on the goverment's web page at MHCLG.
This version updates previous releases of "Homelessness in England", adding two further year's data and adding region names to assist with analysis of the national picture.
resources.name: Homelessness in England 2009-10 to 2017-8 (xls)

resources.description:
A comma separated file providing three monthly update on homelessness for each district in England. The data is provided by CLG as a live table. This open data version merges all the separate CLG data "tabs" for the past two years into one worksheet to make it easier to use and analysis.

Version 4 removes some coding errors in previous verison, but covers exactly the same data.
resources.name: Three-monthly update on homelessness across England
